text: Hornungia alpina (also Hutchinsia alpina or Pritzelago alpina) is a flowering plant in the family Brassicaceae. It is native to the mountains of Southern and Central Europe, as far south as northern Spain (Pyrenees and Cordillera Cantábrica), central Italy and North Macedonia , and is sometimes grown as an ornamental plant in gardens . ==References== ==External links== Category:Brassicaceae Category:Alpine flora Category:Flora of Europe Category:Flora of the Pyrenees Category:Flora of the Alps Category:Garden plants of Europe
title: Hornungia alpina
